did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Juliette Treant-Mathe booklet, Ms2001-037, Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The Juliette Treant-Mathe booklet was added to the IAWA Small Collections Ms2009-054 in September 2009.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of a booklet entitled "Gais Logis" which has smaller pamphlets containing information about five apartment complexes that Treant-Mathe designed.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: See also the IAWA Small Collections. Finding aid available on the Virginia Heritage database.
